contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Wadomari |JapaneseName= 和泊町 |settlement_type= Town |MapImage= Wadomari in Kagoshima Prefecture.png |Region= [[Kyūshū]] ([[Ryukyu Islands|Ryukyu]]) |Prefecture= [[Kagoshima Prefecture|Kagoshima]] ([[Ōshima Subprefecture (Kagoshima)|Ōshima]]) |District=[[Ōshima District, Kagoshima|Ōshima]] |Area_km2=40.37 |PopDate=April 2008 |Population=7,159 |Density_km2=177 |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees= 27 |LatitudeMinutes= 24 |LatitudeSeconds= 0 |LongtitudeDegrees= 128 |LongtitudeMinutes= 38 |LongtitudeSeconds= 57 |Tree=[[Banyan]] |Flower=[[Lilium longiflorum|Teppōyuri]] |Bird= |SymbolImage= |SymbolDescription= Flag |Mayor= [[Sanetoshi Ijichi]] |CityHallPostalCode=891-9192 |CityHallAddress=10, Wadomari, Wadomari-chō, Ōshima-gun, Kagoshima-ken |CityHallPhone= 0997-92-1111 |CityHallLink= [http://www.town.wadomari.kagoshima.jp/ Wadomari Town] }} [[Image:Nihonichi gajumaru.jpg|thumb|A [[banyan]] in Wadomari.]] {{nihongo|'''Wadomari'''|和泊町|Wadomari-chō}} is a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Ōshima District, Kagoshima|Ōshima District]], [[Kagoshima Prefecture|Kagoshima]], [[Japan]]. As of 2008, the town has an estimated [[population]] of 7,159 and the [[population density|density]] of 177 persons per km². The total area is 40.37 km². Wadomari governs a section of [[Okinoerabujima]]. [[Okinoerabu Airport]], located in Wadomari, serves Wadomari. ==External links== *[http://www.town.wadomari.kagoshima.jp/ Official website] in Japanese [[Category:Towns in Kagoshima Prefecture]] {{Kagoshima-geo-stub}}
